word: Dear Sister Belden: [MRS. STEPHEN T. BELDEN. HER HUSBAND DIED NOVEMBER 4, 1906.] We received your letter in the last mail. When you write again, please tell us where you are living, how you are situated, and what you propose to do. I understand that you intend to remain on Norfolk Island. How do you expect to make your living? We are anxious to know all that you can tell us about yourself.
